name: opendirect-mcp-server
description: MCP Server implementation of IAB Tech Lab OpenDirect v2.1 specification for programmatic direct advertising inventory management

OpenDirect.Account.description: Defines a buyer-advertiser relationship for managing orders

OpenDirect.Order.description: Specifies campaign plan with dates, budget, and currency for all line items

cat.description: IAB Tech Lab Content Taxonomy categories

packageonly.description: Whether inventory is only available as package

OpenDirect.Line.description: Line items providing details about products being booked

cost.description: Projected cost based on quantity and rate

frequencycount.description: Max times user sees ads in interval

OpenDirect.Product.description: Product catalog item from ad placement to Run of Network

leadtime.description: Days from today that line can begin

alladunits.description: Whether all child ad units served together

OpenDirect.Creative.description: Ad creative to be displayed for order lines

OpenDirect.Assignment.description: Associates a creative with an order line

OpenDirect.Organization.description: Represents an advertiser, agency, or publisher

OpenDirect.ChangeRequest.description: Request to modify an existing order

OpenDirect.Placement.description: Ad unit specifications for a line item

creativespec.description: Override ad unit specs if provided

iurl.description: Representative image URL for ad quality checking

rend.description: AMP ad requirements: 1=unknown, 2=not allowed, 3=allowed no early render, 4=allowed with early render, 5=required

id.description: Publisher ID from ads.txt / Organization ID

AdCOM.AdSpec.description: Ad specification for bidding or OpenDirect packages

OpenRTB.Deal.description: Direct deal between buyer and seller

at.description: Auction type: 1=First Price, 2=Second Price Plus, 3=Fixed Price

OpenRTB.PMP.description: Private marketplace container for direct deals

pchain.description: Payment ID chain (TAG Payment ID Protocol)
